Let me transform this resume into a coherent story:

April Bradford's professional journey is a testament to her dedication to human resources and people management. After graduating Magna Cum Laude from Fayetteville State University with a Bachelor's in Communication, she continued her education, earning an MBA in Business Finance from Strayer University with honors.

Her career path began in 2014 as a Branch Coordinator, where she masterfully juggled multiple responsibilities including managing front desk operations, coordinating interviews, and handling sensitive payroll information. She quickly advanced to become a Recruiting Coordinator, demonstrating her natural aptitude for human resources.

From late 2014 to mid-2016, April took on the role of Admissions Representative, where she became known for her personal touch in guiding both high school and adult students through their educational journeys. Her ability to connect with people and ensure compliance with regulations made her stand out in this position.

Since 2016, April has found her true calling as an HR Contact Center Specialist. In this role, she's become the go-to person for resolving employee and manager issues, from handling year-end compensation processes to managing employee data changes. Her initiative and leadership qualities haven't gone unnoticed – she's taken on additional responsibilities in new hire training and women in leadership programs.

Throughout her career, April has maintained active involvement in professional organizations, including the Greenville Society for Human Resource Management and the Society for Human Resource Management. She's also demonstrated leadership in her community through her involvement with Alpha Kappa Alpha Sorority, Inc., where she served as Treasurer and Chair of the Budget and Finance Committee.

April's story is one of continuous growth and dedication to helping others, backed by her strong technical skills in MS Office Suite and her exceptional interpersonal abilities. Her meticulous attention to detail and time management skills have made her a valuable asset in every role she's undertaken.

This forward-thinking professional continues to make her mark in the HR field, always ready to take on new challenges and mentor others along the way.
